column7:
Movie title for Amelie wrongly translated + inconsistency in names --> sometimes translated in chinese, sometimes not
Vary Articulation ≠ 变化发音 --> 演奏法
Main issue: some technical musical terms are not translated correctly and names
But semantically we get the idea and understand what it means

Could you write a love letter to a girl that I really like? ≠ 你能给我真正喜欢的女孩写一封情书吗 (=could you write a love letter to the real girl I like?)--> 你能给我真的很喜欢的女孩写一封情书吗
Habibi not translated once but is translated in the poem
